definition.name: discrete_Hilbert_transform
definition.definition: For p in P_n with roots lambda_1,...,lambda_n, define H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j \!= i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j) = p''(lambda_i)/(2 p'(lambda_i)). Equivalently, H_p(lambda_i) is the regular part of n G_p(z) at z = lambda_i: n G_p(z) = 1/(z - lambda_i) + H_p(lambda_i) + O(z - lambda_i).
